channel.title: microsoft on Yash Raj Singh
channel.description: Recent content in microsoft on Yash Raj Singh

item.title: UK Weather Analyzer
item.description: 10K UK Weather Analyzer and Visualization In October 2016, I participated & won ‘Best Technical Award’ in the prestigious 10K Apart Challenge of 2016. 10K Apart International Challenge by Microsoft & An Event Apart is about building a compelling web experience that can be delivered in 10kB and works without JavaScript. About 380 entries took part from around the globe, judged by some of the best developers, designers of the industry.
